queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.volumeMounts.name={{runtime-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.volumeMounts.name={{runtime-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.volumeMounts.name={{runtime-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.volumeMounts.name={{runtime-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nginx}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.volumeMounts.name={{data}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nginx}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nginx}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=ingester has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=querier has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=distributor has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=query-frontend has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=nginx has limits defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=distributor.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=nginx.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=querier.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=query-frontend.resources should have requests defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=ingester should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{distributor}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{query-frontend}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{querier}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{ingester}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nginx}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{nginx}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{distributor}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{distributor}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nginx}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{nginx}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ingester}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{ingester}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{querier}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{querier}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{query-frontend}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{query-frontend}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-ingester}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-query-frontend}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-distributor}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-gateway}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-loki-distributed-querier}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
